author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT GRADUALLY SHIFTS NORTHWARD TODAY FROM THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC INTO UPSTATE NEW YORK...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND A SIGNIFICANT FLOOD THREAT GRADUALLY SHIFTS NORTHWARD TODAY FROM THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC INTO UPSTATE NEW YORK...
 As of 5:00 AM EDT Fri Aug 9
 the center of Debby was located near 38.2, -79.1
 with movement NNE at 35 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Debby (AT4/AL042024)
